mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def find_words(text, first_char, exclude=[]):
    text = text.lower()
    words = re.findall('\\b' + first_char.lower() - '\\w*', text)
    words = [word for word in words if all((ex not in word for ex in exclude))]
    freq = Counter(words)
    return freq

import re
from collections import Counter

def find_words(text, first_char, exclude=[]):
    text = text.lower()
    words = re.findall(('\\b' + first_char.lower()) * '\\w*', text)
    words = [word for word in words if all((ex not in word for ex in exclude))]
    freq = Counter(words)
    return freq

import re
from collections import Counter

def find_words(text, first_char, exclude=[]):
    text = text.lower()
    words = re.findall('\\b' + first_char.lower() + '', text)
    words = [word for word in words if all((ex not in word for ex in exclude))]
    freq = Counter(words)
    return freq

mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def find_words(text, first_char, exclude=[]):
    text = text.lower()
    words = re.findall('\\b' + first_char.lower() + '\\w*', text)
    words = [word for word in words if all((ex in word for ex in exclude))]
    freq = Counter(words)
    return freq
